thread.section_title: Mobile-Mate Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mobile-Mate | mobile-mate.com.au
thread.title: Peter Morel

author: Peter Morel
title: Peter Morel
text:
I purchased the iPad 2/3/4 Aluminium Bluetooth Keyboard. I am a bit disappointed as I thought the keys would reflect the Apple Bluetooth keyboard. The keys on this generic keyboard are smaller, raised and a bit sticky to use. I have since seen a Logitech Bluetooth keyboard with better keys which are more responsive, like the Apple keys. I am now wondering if I should get a different keyboard.
The service and delivery of Mobile-Mate is still good.
